result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ga: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa GhearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúrsaí contúirteaċ tar éis urġaḃáil ċuṁaċta na Naitsiṫe sa ĠearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: It was a violent, dangerous area.
result.ga: Ceantar foréigneach baolach a bhí ann
result.orig: Ceantar foréigneach baolach a bhí ann
result.html: Ceantar foréigneach baolach a bhí annIt was a violent, dangerous area.
result.ponchtml: Ceantar foréigneaċ baolaċ a ḃí annIt was a violent, dangerous area.
